name: two_strings_query
author: 罗干
complexity: O(log n) per operation and query using enhanced suffix array and segment tree techniques.
summary: Given two strings A and B, and a series of operations that modify string A (inserting characters at specific positions), answer queries about how many times string B appears as a contiguous substring in the current version of A. The challenge lies in efficiently maintaining and querying substring occurrences after dynamic modifications.
